articles.title: Microsoft: Xbox is now the "biggest publisher" on PlayStation, as PC Game Pass hits 45% year over year growth - Windows Central
articles.description: Microsoft's gaming fortunes are on the up and up, as it posts record Q3 growth in a tough market.

articles.title: Microsoft’s most capable new Phi 4 AI model rivals the performance of far larger systems - TechCrunch
articles.description: Microsoft has launched several new 'open' AI models, the most capable of which is competitive with OpenAI's o3-mini on at least one benchmark.

articles.title: Google’s Gemini chatbot gets upgraded image creation tools - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google's Gemini chatbot app now lets you modify both AI-generated images and images uploaded from your phone or computer.

articles.title: New Details Surface on Destiny 1’s Original ‘Staten Cut’ Story Before the 2013 Reboot - The Game Post
articles.description: A new post breaks down Destiny 1’s scrapped "Staten-cut" campaign, revealing campaign structure, characters, factions, and a completely different story Bungie originally planned before the 2013 rewrite.

articles.title: Sketchy rumors hint at an iPhone desktop mode - The Verge
articles.description: Rumors suggest that Apple is working on Stage Manager for iPhones with external display support, raising the possibility of a desktop mode for iOS.

articles.title: Google Just Launched an AI-Powered Duolingo Alternative - Lifehacker
articles.description: But does it have a cute animal mascot? (No.)
